Super Kick Bros
-
SIGN IN WITH YOUR ACCOUNT
OR, REGISTER IF YOU DO NOT HAVE ONE
Game Instruction:
Game rule: Players need to prevent the opposing player from scoring a goal while trying hard to attack to accumulate points. The player who gets 3 points will win the game.
Remember there is an enemy in the middle! Do not touch it or you will move slower!
Time Limit: 3 minutes
----------------------- -----------------------
How To Play
W Jump
A Moving Left
D Moving Right
Spacebar Kick
J -> K -> L Cheat skills
